snippet: Named for his career-defining 1975 album, the book will cover the “poetry, danger and darkness” of Mr. Springsteen’s New Jersey childhood and his drive to become a musician.
abstract: Named for his career-defining 1975 album, the book will cover the “poetry, danger and darkness” of Mr. Springsteen’s New Jersey childhood and his drive to become a musician.

headline.main: Bruce Springsteen Autobiography ‘Born to Run’ Set for September
headline.print_headline: Springsteen Memoir Is Set for September
